title: I like how there are 0 complaints on boards about Cammile
body: You would think that Cammile being broken for around 7 months would cause an uproar but...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=377cWLiIW0A
She's been top tier in top lane for ages now. She's definitely not bad at all.

This is the same interaction as a lot of delayed dashes like Trist W, Ezreal E. She is not immune to CC, any stun whilst she is in flight to the wall will stop the dash entirely and she cannot recast it whilst cc'd (the delay on her reaching the wall and leaving it are because she is still stunned by blitz Q). Taunts and Charms will cause her to forfeit E2 entirely by making her leave the wall whilst roots and stuns (that hit whilst on the wall) will delay her recasting it such that it potentially expires.

Maybe you should actually understand an ability before talking about it and not spread misinformation.

Only the players that can truly use her at 80-100% of her max potential can succeed with her. Right now shes bad in low elo , but Amazing in high elo. Also shes not as broken as she used to be 1+ years ago.

People seem to complain all the time but we have Irelia and Akali who take up all the threads. She's been OP since release.

I honestly dont mind Camille's true damage spikes I do think it kinda pushes Fiora out of a job but then again I would rather Fiora see a mini-rework to HER kit than Camille giving up her Q Currently I think Fiora is in this weird spot where her entire champion kit is made to brute force lane wins and then do nothing else actually helpful or beneficial to her team. Her entire schtick being that eventually she gets to point where she scales SO HIGH you just cannot feasibly interact with her and you just concede your base to her splitpush in the 1v1 thats so lame and stupid and is already pretty much Nasus's gimmick so idk.

my MAIN problem with Camille is that she has mechanical over-rewarding. Where she just has a billion different smaller mechanics that power creep the shit out of her.

I think the Attack Speed upon landing E (was the stun and Gapcloser not good enough? Camille isnt eventhe type of character to spam AA's but rather she is supposed to play around methodical Q's timings and spellblade passive)
and the %max hp magic damage on R (was the True Damage not good enough at melting through tanks?) should both get removed.

Im sick and tired of every champion coming out now having a billion fine print mechanics on every ability.
Camille still has her moments but for the most part I think she is tolerable currently. Thats not to say she couldnt use work.

Honest Opinion? I think it's because Camille has such a low play rate because she wasn't launched as a sexy character many people pick up. Only Hardcore Camilles play her out of function, because she's not actually that attractive to play, nor are her lines.

On the other hand, Neeko and Ornn and Kayn and Pyke and Zoe...... all have interesting lines, interactions, fulfill a fantasy that's easy to grasp, and generally fun to master playstyles. Most are also aesthetically appealing to their player bases.

Hence why they attempted to put out sexy skins for Lissandra and Camille. Buried champs with low playrates who actually DO have potential.
